arts.ttl: David scores twice as Lille beats Auxerre 3-1 to pressure Lyon in race for Champions League
arts.sum: Canada striker Jonathan David scored two goals and set up the other as Lille beat Auxerre 3-1 on Sunday to maintain its push for a Champions League place next season. David ran through deep into injury time and held off defenders before grabbing his 16th league goal of what is likely to be his final season at Lille.

arts.ttl: Preview: Lille vs. Auxerre - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Sunday's Ligue 1 clash between Lille and Auxerre, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.

arts.ttl: Auxerre’s Clément Akpa attracting Everton and Wolves interest
arts.sum: AJ Auxerre have surpassed all expectations and with five games to go in Ligue 1, are already assured of safety. There have been some stand-out performers for L’AJA. Hamed Traoré has garnered…
